skills.name: CORRUPTED CUT
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.

skills.name: MAD DANCE
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Remove Beneficial Effects from the target.
• Permadeath prevents the target from being revived if they die.

skills.name: COUNTER
desc: 50% Chance to counter attack the opponent that attacked you.
